newsitem.title: UK: Nomura sets Japanese breakout index call warrants.
newsitem.headline: Nomura sets Japanese breakout index call warrants.

text.p: Nomura International said it has issued one million American-style call warrants, on an index of Tokyo listed companies.
The index termed 'Nomura Japanese breakout index' is based on a complex formula that includes shares of Kyocera Corp, TDK Corp, Seven Eleven, Tokyo Electron and Secom Co Ltd.
One warrant refers to one index.
